TITLE: Configuring Productive API Client in Standalone Ruby Project
DESCRIPTION: Configure the API key and account ID for the Productive API client in a standalone Ruby project using the configuration block.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Productive.configure do |config|
  config.api_key = ENV.fetch('productive_api_key')
  config.account_id = ACCOUNT_ID
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Productive API Resources in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the Productive API client to query resources, including pagination and filtering options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Productive::Project.all
Productive::Project.paginate(per_page: 50).page(5).find

Productive::Project.where(client_id: 1).all
Productive::Project.where(
  created_at: {
    lt_eq: '2025-04-30',
    gt_eq: '2025-03-31'
  }
).paginate(page: 1, per_page: 200).all
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Productive API Client in Rails
DESCRIPTION: Generate an initializer file for the Productive API client in a Rails project, setting up the API key and account ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
rails generate productive API_KEY ACCOUNT_ID
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Productive API Client Gem in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Add the 'productive' gem to your Gemfile and run bundle install to install the gem and its dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
gem 'productive'
```

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
bundle install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing Productive API Client Paginator in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Configure a custom paginator for the Productive API client using the configuration block.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Productive.configure do |config|
  config.paginator = MyCustomPaginator
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Custom API Endpoint for Productive API Client in Ruby
DESCRIPTION: Set a custom base URL for the Productive API endpoint using the configuration block.
SOURCE: https://github.com/productiveio/api_client/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: ruby
CODE:
```
Productive.configure do |config|
  config.base_url = 'http://api.productive.dev/api/v2/'
end
```
